title: Accounting / Admin Assistant
job_overview:
Our client is looking for an Administrative Asst. / Accounting Assistant to work with their NY team on a long term engagement. 

Work includes report generation/preparation, AR/AP, data processing such as order entry, style info entry, and the likes. Most of the work takes place on their proprietary software (which they will train you on), Microsoft Excel, and MS Outlook. Good communication with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers in NY and in other remote locations is essential. 

They will also need  a PC, MS Office and a consistent and fast internet connection. Candidates will be needed for 30 to 40 hours per week during NY business hours.   Please apply ONLY if you intend to work on long-term basis.

Salary:  $3/hour, non-negotiable; 
Work hours:  9am-530pm EDT, non-negotiable

Interested applicants must be willing to complete our initial assessment and client's skill test.  Email your resume to Upgrade to see actual info
